questList.questDescription: Restore balance to the Shadowed Ruins by either eliminating or forming an alliance with one of the following creatures: Shadeveil Phantasma (Nullmist Wraith Sentinel), Gravestone Guardian (Spiritbound Stoneward), or Dreadsteel Marrowmancer (Boneclad Legionnaire).
Unite the forces of light and darkness by forming an alliance with either Sheraveil Phantasma, Gravestone Guardian, or Dreadsteel Marrowmancer in the Shadowed Ruins.
Defeat the darkness of the Shadowed Ruins by eliminating Shadeveil Phantasma (Nullmist Wraith Sentinel) to claim the amulet of alliance.

Harmonize the Ethereal Grove by either vanquishing or forming an alliance with one of the following creatures: Serpentwrath Sentinel (Slithershade Warder), Ivybreeze Enchantress (Verdantbloom Maiden), or Glacierfire Wyrmheart (Frostgale Goldclaw).
Unveil the hidden whispers of the Ethereal Grove by forging an alliance with either Serpentwrath Sentinel, Ivybreeze Enchantress, or Glacierfire Wyrmheart.
Triumph over the shadows in the Ethereal Grove by eliminating Ivybreeze Enchantress (Verdantbloom Maiden) to claim the amulet of alliance.
Conquer the abyss of Lor'thelar and bring an end to the malevolent reign by vanquishing the legendary Duskwraith Harbinger (Nightfall Soulbrand) to claim victory.
Echo the light within the Abyss of Sorrows by forming an alliance with the Abyssal Souldrainer (Shadowencased Necromonarch) to receive the amulet of healing.
Claim victory over the shadows by eliminating Abyssal Souldrainer (Shadowencased Necromonarch) in Lor'thelar's Abyss to acquire the amulet of alliance.
